modName: Multi -- House Map Markers by Smakit
summary:
*** Minor Update *** Tweaked English versions to work with Hearthfire [was a mistake I made, oops! Should work fine now as of 1.2 versions]

[English / German / Polish / Spanish / French / Italian / Russian]
Simply adds map markers to be discovered for the 5 cities where homes can be purchased (Markarth, Riften, Solitude, Windhelm, Whiterun). Yo
descriptionHtml:
LANGUAGES AVAILABLE:
English / German / Polish / Spanish / French / Italian / Russian

Simply adds map markers to be discovered for the 5 cities where homes can be purchased (Markarth, Riften, Solitude, Windhelm, Whiterun). You need to go to the homes after installing the mod in order to discover the marker, then you can fast travel back to it like any other marker.

=========================================================================================
ENGLISH MARKERS -PLUS-

     Note that this version adds a few other marks to the mix (The Companions, Archmage Quarters, the Solitude House main-floor entrance, the top of Sky Haven Temple, and Castle Dour) as requested by other users. All markers are in English. 

WARNING: Select only the regular house map markers mod OR the map markers plus -- do not use both together! The PLUS version will include all the house markers. I did it this way to help reduce clutter of multiple mod files for such a small change.
=========================================================================================

Puts you at the front door of each home. Markers are available for discovery regardless of whether you purchased the house (in case you just want to get closer to something in town via fast traveling to the house marker). They are set to require discovery so that they aren\'t already visible when you start a new game.

This is up on the workshop and a handful of users requested it put here, so here it is. Nothing exciting, nothing fancy, but hopefully useful to those without a similar mod.

Thanks to some help, I was able to get translations for the German, Polish, French, and Spanish names of the homes so I could throw them in. They are less tested, but I think should work fine - just let me know of any problems of course. Should go without saying, but only have one language in use at a time.


As you can see, I am missing at least Japanese. I have the characters, but I need to find out how to get them into the Creation Kit (just shows up as ????s even though it copies/pastes fine into notepad and other various places -- might need to change the system language or some such).

English: Me
German: Acceleratio & Mewnicorn
Polish: Mavado Vemos
French & Spanish: Deadpool
Italian: I grabbed them from the Italian Creation Kit
Russian: listen (from the Nexus here) has created this version of the mod completely, though y1Xu6 and Greatdalamar offered translations of the houses - so all thanks go to them!

=========================================================================================
NOTE FOR NON-ENGLISH TRANSLATIONS: I\'ve had a few reports of the mod changing house names. This mod, however, doesn\'t change anything except adding the map markers. In every case so far it has been found to be another mod, as this mod by itself with none other installed worked just fine. If you are using a mod loader you might try changing the order.

The Russian version was created by listen, and I have not been able to test it. If there is any problems specific to this version, let me know.
=========================================================================================

Arsenalrobert made a video about some of the day one release mods and features a quick tidbit about my mod and requested I place it here. There isn\'t a whole lot to necessarily \'see\' for this mod, but it does showcase it, so here you go. =) 

[youtube]j77oP8yaSbQ&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
author: SmakitDaSailor
